impact_points.description: Establishing a legally defined non-profit sector to separate profit interests from housing development ensuring affordability
impact_points.reasoning: Directly addresses housing affordability which is critical for social equity and aligns with the city's claim of being 'affordable for everyone'

impact_points.description: Implementing measures to adapt infrastructure and green spaces to climate change including heatwave and flood resilience
impact_points.reasoning: Essential for long-term sustainability and meets the 55% CO2 reduction target while protecting vulnerable populations

impact_points.description: Creating a 365-euro regional ticket and improving public transit and cycling infrastructure for sustainable mobility
impact_points.reasoning: Key to reducing traffic congestion and emissions while improving accessibility for all citizens

impact_points.description: Expanding fiber optics 5G and open WLAN to make Dortmund a high-speed city with digitalized municipal services
impact_points.reasoning: Critical for economic competitiveness and modernizing public services to meet 2030 digitalization goals

impact_points.description: Creating permanent police bike patrols and combating neo-Nazism through community engagement and safety programs
impact_points.reasoning: Addresses social cohesion and safety concerns while reinforcing Dortmund's identity as a tolerant city

impact_points.description: Providing free swimming pool access for children and seniors and transforming libraries into community learning centers
impact_points.reasoning: Supports child development and lifelong learning while addressing inequality in access to recreational facilities

impact_points.description: Digitizing all municipal services by 2030 to ensure equitable access for all citizens
impact_points.reasoning: Improves efficiency and inclusivity of public services while reducing bureaucratic barriers

impact_points.description: Implementing annual 5% reductions in heavy traffic burden with infrastructure improvements and road damage mitigation
impact_points.reasoning: Directly impacts air quality and quality of life while supporting climate goals through reduced emissions

impact_points.description: Establishing the first German staff unit to combat loneliness through community engagement and social support networks
impact_points.reasoning: Addresses mental health and social isolation which are growing concerns in urban environments

impact_points.description: Expanding cultural offerings with free access for children and testing pay-what-you-can models for events
impact_points.reasoning: Enhances cultural participation and economic accessibility while supporting local creative industries
